reporter_caption.center: WHITMAN v. KIRK CO., 236 Ill. App. 638 (1925)

caption.center: Albert C. Whitman, appellee, v. Kirk Company, appellant.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture:
Action to recover damages for personal injuries. Judgment for plaintiff.
Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. Isaac B. Craig, Judge, presiding. Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1923.
opinion.attorneys: Moloney Postelnek, Cutting, Moore Sidley and Cassels, Potter Bentley, for appellant; Ralph F. Potter and E.C. Austin, of counsel. Morse Ives, H.H. Patterson and Chas. C. Bodenstab, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Justice Johnston delivered the opinion of the court.
